text.autoconfig.raisedclouds.option.base: The base Y of the clouds.
text.autoconfig.raisedclouds.option.came: Whether the clouds should be anchored
text.autoconfig.raisedclouds.option.over: Whether the base Y of the clouds
should use the value below, instead
text.autoconfig.raisedclouds.option.scal: The scale of the Y position of the clouds.
text.autoconfig.raisedclouds.option.spee: The speed at which the clouds move,
relative to the default speed of 1.
text.autoconfig.raisedclouds.title: Raised Clouds Configuration
